mapper.insert: insert into board(title, userid, contents) values(#{title}, #{userid}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select CEIL(count(bno)/25) pages from board where ${fkey} like #{fval}
mapper.update: update board set views = views + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, regdate = current_timestamp() where bno = #{bno}
